snippet.title: Polar Rollout (iOS Trailer) - Launches April 18th 2018: PRE-ORDER FREE NOW!
snippet.description:
PRE-ORDER FREE NOW - https://itunes.apple.com/app/polar-rollout/id1331146034

Polar Rollout is an upcoming indie mobile game for iOS (iPhone & iPad).  Experience original line-drawing physics action in this magical puzzle adventure!

Coming to the App Store on April 18, 2018.
---
FOLLOW:

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/polarrollout
Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/polarrollout
